mapper.select: SELECT j.Fction_id pid,j.Fction_name pname,j.Fction_assembly aname,j.Fction_src psrc,j.Fction_icon picon,f.Fction_state pstate,f.* FROM function_jurisdiction j inner join function_jurisdiction f on j.Fction_id = f.Fction_cid WHERE j.Fction_cid is null
select f.Fction_id from function_jurisdiction f inner join role_middle_jurisdiction rf on f.Fction_id = rf.Fction_id where rf.r_id = #{rId} and f.Fction_id is not null

select p.Fction_id pid,p.Fction_name pname,p.Fction_assembly aname,p.Fction_src psrc,p.Fction_icon picon,p.Fction_state pstate,f.* from function_jurisdiction p inner join function_jurisdiction f on f.Fction_cid = p.Fction_id inner join role_middle_jurisdiction rf on f.Fction_id = rf.Fction_id inner join role_middle_user ur on rf.r_id = ur.r_id where ur.U_id = #{uId}
